Subject: Neo Beast Wars

::DarkMouse::

She took the rat off her shoulder and set on a small tree stump. "Now 
you stay here and don't run off. I'll have lunch in no time flat for 
you."
She stepped out into the stream and took out a small dagger.  After 
several attemps, she finally speared a fish.  She tossed, it on the 
bank and walked out of the stream. She put her blade away and looked 
about.  she found some dry twigs and some old, dry grass.  She piled 
them together and set some rocks around the little pile.  She took 
out her small lazar gun and zapped the pile.  It burst into flame and 
she had her own little fire going.  She went over nad picked up the 
fish, cleaned it and pulled a slightly charred stick out of the 
fire.  She put the fish on the stick and rested it on the fire.
"See little one? I hope you like your fish wel done though."
She went over and picked up the rat.  It crawled up onto her shoulder 
and looked hungrily at the fish cooking. it smacked it's little lips 
and nudged her neck.
"I know, I know your hungry.  Give it a few more moments and it's 
ready.  I'll let you have the best pieces, I promise." she chuckled.

She sat on the stump and looked into the fire.  She couldn't remeber 
anything before waking up in that strange lab.   She wondered why it 
was deserted.  Was it because of a battle there? Was it because the 
bots who occupied the base left for a better one? She had many 
questions and no answers.  She looked at the symbol on her arm and 
recognized it.  she knew what it was and what it stood for. But 
nothing else about it.
